title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, push models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; supports streaming, embeddings, custom options.

title: ollama-cli (node)
summary: Interactive CLI chat tool built on ollama-js with conversation history & markdown.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like coding assistant for VS Code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, pull models in C# with strongly-typed responses.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-gui (Tauri)
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Rust (Tauri) + React.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama REST API with async HTTP and streaming support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async client for Ollama (chat, generate, embed).

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines with GPU passthrough.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings local LLM assistance via Ollama into your notes.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-rustic
summary: Lightweight Rust CLI for Ollama with colorful REPL and history.
